last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: The remaining men compete in the Emperor's Games - the grand final. They and their girlfriends have shed blood, sweat and tears to make it this far, but just one lad will leave Rome a hero and be crowned the Ultimate Broman. In their most brutal battles yet, the lads go to war in the Colosseum in front of a packed crowd. Finally, after weeks of mystery, the identity of the Emperor is revealed.

name: Bromans
overview: Eight 21st century lads are transported back to the Roman Empire to see if they can cut it as gladiators. The handsome boys will fight it out with help from their loving girlfriends. They may have the muscles but do these lads have what it takes to go down in history?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Eight 21st century lads are transported back to the Roman Empire to see if they can cut it as gladiators.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: This time, there are some new arrivals, and the lads battle it out to avoid banishment.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A brand new Broman and his girlfriend arrive in Rome. Jordan battles for Jade's affections.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: It is the halfway point, but with two of the boys heading to prison, it is up to their girlfriends to take their place in training.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Rome is rocked by the arrival of an explosive new couple. With tensions higher than ever before, some of the citizens reach breaking point.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A trip to the Roman launderette leaves the citizens dirtier than when they arrived, and with the Emperor's Games on the horizon, training becomes tougher than ever before.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: It is the eve of the grand final - the Emperor's Games. Tensions are high as the citizens have one last chance to impress. Just one more banishment stands between them and the games, and at this late stage, no one wants to go home. With training harder than ever, the Bromans are pushed to their limits and are in need of some pampering, but a day in the Roman spa does not turn out to be as relaxing as imagined.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The remaining men compete in the Emperor's Games - the grand final. They and their girlfriends have shed blood, sweat and tears to make it this far, but just one lad will leave Rome a hero and be crowned the Ultimate Broman. In their most brutal battles yet, the lads go to war in the Colosseum in front of a packed crowd. Finally, after weeks of mystery, the identity of the Emperor is revealed.
